name: @eusilvio/cep-lookup-vue
description: Vue composition API hooks for cep-lookup.
author: Silvio Souza

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --build && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=neutral --format=cjs --outdir=dist --out-extension:.js=.cjs --minify --external:vue --external:@eusilvio/cep-lookup && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=neutral --format=esm --outdir=dist --out-extension:.js=.mjs --minify --external:vue --external:@eusilvio/cep-lookup
